channel.title: Few questions here.. Please help!
channel.description:
Hi guys.. These are probably some "Noob" questions, but idc. I'm not that good at coding, just started. Ok, I got a few questions.
1. Ok, I'm using RichScape Source. When I log in, I die like 9 out of 10 times. Now why's that?.. Here's a picture.
[img]http://i487.photobucket.com/albums/rr239/Macronizer/mathieu2.jpg[/img]
2. You guys probably already saw this. There's file, tools, sites, music and screenshot at the top of the client. When I click on the file, you can put an server ip. Now, I already set it up for when they open up the client, the ip for my server is already there for then so they don't need to change it. But how can I make it so they [b]can't[/b]change it? Same thing for "sites".. how can I make it so when they click on my site, it goes to the site? I'm not sure if you guys know what I mean, but here's a picture.
[img]http://i487.photobucket.com/albums/rr239/Macronizer/mathieu4.jpg[/img]
I hope you guys can help me with that. :o Thanks in advance.
~ Macoronizer
Edit : Damn, just notice. Wrong section. Can a moderator please move this. ( Stupid me =\ )

item.title: Few questions here.. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Hi guys… These are probably some “Noob” questions, but idc. I’m not that good at coding, just started. Ok, I got a few questions.

  1. Ok, I’m using RichScape Source. When I log in, I die like 9 out of 10 times. Now why’s that?.. Here’s a picture.

mathieu2.jpg789×567

  1. You guys probably already saw this. There’s file, tools, sites, music and screenshot at the top of the client. When I click on the file, you can put an server ip. Now, I already set it up for when they open up the client, the ip for my server is already there for then so they don’t need to change it. But how can I make it so they can’tchange it? Same thing for “sites”… how can I make it so when they click on my site, it goes to the site? I’m not sure if you guys know what I mean, but here’s a picture.

mathieu4.jpg785×577

I hope you guys can help me with that. :o
Thanks in advance.

~ Macoronizer

Edit : Damn, just notice. Wrong section. Can a moderator please move this. ( Stupid me =\ )
